actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill authorizing the President to proclaim the third week of May as "Lone Defenders Week".

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue a proclamation, in conjunction with "Armed Forces Day", designating the full third week of May as "Lone Defenders Week", and calls upon the people of the United States to observe such a week with appropriate ceremonies and activites.

titles.title: A bill authorizing the President to proclaim the third week of May as "Lone Defenders Week".
